name: Morth
description:
A string of disappearances has lead a novice detective to the village of Drakehorn. Find out what's causing the disappearances before time runs out! You're the only one strong enough (or foolish enough) to attempt such a feat.

This is a short game where your choices will help or hinder your ability to solve the mystery!

No playthrough is exactly the same with Morth's skill check system. Your choices will slightly increase certain skills and will help you overcome challenges.



The game will take approximately 15 minutes to complete with two possible endings and multiple playthroughs may be required to accomplish the desired ending.



features

*Classic choose-your-own-adventure gameplay
*Chiptune Soundtrack
*Skill-check systems allows for varied gameplay
*Solve a Medieval Mystery!
